players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "'I believe Charlie's death was a clear sign that we need to be cautious and work together as a team. Let's focus on identifying any unusual behavior or inconsistencies during our discussions.'..."
Bob: "I agree with Diana. We need to be cautious and look for inconsistencies. Let's all share our thoughts."

Diana: "I want to remind everyone that we need to be vigilant and trust each other, but also maintain open communication. Let's continue to share any suspicions or concerns we may have. We can only uncover the truth if we work together."

You: "I believe we should focus on finding the real killer among us. Since Charlie's death, I have noticed that some of our fellow villagers seem uneasy or guarded. Let's try to identify any patterns or behaviors that might be indicative of the m..."
Bob: "I think we should look at who was silent or hesitant. Alice spoke last but was silent first round. Diana seems cooperative. Let's vote carefully."
